title: Deduplicate and rate-limit warning_alerts notifications across email/Slack

sections.text: Fix cases where warning_alerts generate repeated email/Slack notifications for the same account/opportunity and condition across successive sync runs. Implement an idempotency key and persistence (e.g., per {object_id, alert_type, threshold_state} with a TTL/cooldown) so alerts only resend when the state clears and re-triggers or after a configured interval. Ensure dedupe works consistently across channels and add a small test suite to cover duplicate run and “clear then re-trigger” scenarios.
